title: Acknowledge new version of a compliance document
description: A new version of a safety procedure has been released. An operator needs to acknowledge that they have read and understood it.

tasks.description: Access the list of pending training or document acknowledgements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the new safety procedure in their to-do list.

tasks.description: Open and review the new document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reads the updated safety procedure.

tasks.description: Electronically sign to acknowledge understanding of the new procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent signs off on the document, and it is removed from their pending list.
